definition: to thank sb personally/to thank sb to his face
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: Emperor grateful, thank to face Poseidon.
sentences.chinese: 始皇感激不尽，要面谢海神。

definition: to return/to give back/to send back/to repatriate
lit. will not be forgotten even after one's teeth fall out/to remember as long as one lives/unforgettable (idiom)
to shed tears of gratitude (idiom); moved to tears
expression of gratitude/to give thanks/a thank-you note/acknowledgement
to call to pay one's respect/to call on
hard to forget even after one's teeth fall out (idiom); to remember a benefactor as long as one lives/undying gratitude
